name: Wander in the Dark
description:
Wander in the Dark is a cozy exploration game. Collect stars as you navigate procedurally-generated planets in space.

This game was created by my son (age 10) and me (his mom) as a part of the Global Game Jam 2021. My son did all the art and design, while I did the coding and sound. We hope you enjoy this relaxing gaming experience.
